attributes.action: consider the need for a new rail link linking Swindon to Cambrige, via Oxford and Milton Keynes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current rail system in the East and West of England is totally London focused.

Creating a link from Swindon to Cambridge, linking Oxford, Milton Keynes and three major lines, would provide many people from all over the South, West Country, East Midlands and East Anglia a viable alternative to their current car jouneys.
